title: Ridwan Suleiman Adejumo
text:
Ridwan Suleiman Adejumo is a skilled Data Scientist, Technical Writer, and Social Media Marketing Analytics specialist. He is the Founder of LearnData, a consulting firm that empowers businesses and individuals with data-driven insights, training, and tailored analytics solutions.
With deep expertise in data analysis, machine learning, and digital strategy, Ridwan helps organizations turn complex data into actionable insights that drive growth and performance, especially in the evolving landscape of social media and digital marketing.
As a Udemy Instructor, Ridwan has taught thousands of students around the world, creating accessible, practical courses in data science and analytics. His work as a Technical Writer showcases his ability to simplify complex concepts and make them clear, engaging, and useful to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Ridwan is passionate about transforming raw data into meaningful impact and continues to work at the intersection of analytics, education, and digital innovation.
Contact: +2347032857263.
Address: Block C21, Federal Teaching Hospital Quarters, Gombe, Gombe State, Nigeria.
